definitions.definition: To make a judgment (on a dispute ) as an arbitrator or arbiter
To submit (a dispute) to such judgment
To assign an arbitrary value to, or otherwise determine arbitrarily.
examples: We wish to show f is continuous. Arbitrate epsilon greater than zero...

main_definition: To make a judgment (on a dispute ) as an arbitrator or arbiter
secondary_definitions: To submit (a dispute) to such judgment
( mathematics , rare ) To assign an arbitrary value to, or otherwise determine arbitrarily.
